SS gets smashed on his badly burnt back and screams in agony.  He goes 
to robot mode and fires his boomerang, point blank range at Epyon whip 
in an attempt to cut free.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He swings around, on the whip, avoiding the fire, he then starts to 
reel
> the whip back into his shield, very vast, so that SS gets pulled 
right
> into Epyon's shield.
